lead_paragraph: GOLD--Debra (Fridovich), on January 6, 2016, age 103. Beloved wife of the late Theodore. Loving and devoted mother of William (Nili) and the late Jeffrey. Cherished grandmother of Avitai (Jocelyn) and Doria. Special great-grandmother of Elijah and Tali. Dear sister of the late Asenath (Ben) Rosenberg, Renee (Jack) Leeb, Louis (Sylvia) Fridovich, Joseph (Rhoda) Fridovich and Zelig (Rae) Fridovich. Adored aunt and great-aunt to many. Donations may be made to the Yeshivah of Flatbush Scholarship Fund. Services were held January 8. 1/3
